issue.title: [Plasma] Implement delete function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1927](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1927). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The function should check if the reference count of the object is zero and if yes, delete it from the store. If no, it should raise an exception or return a status value.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1927?focusedCommentId=16321344) by Philipp Moritz (pcmoritz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1427
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1427>
